column1: Smoque BBQ////The brisket was perfect: nice pink smoke ring
column3: and full of flavor. Some of the best Brisket I've ever had. The sauce was a perfect compliment to the beef. The sides were very good
column4: but the best part of the whole meal was the Texas sausage. The finest spicy pork  sausage I've ever eaten. Hands down. Nice balance  of spice
column7: wrapped in a natural casing and smoked just right.
